2074.subject: HCOM
2074.course_title_long: Out of Many: Histories Of US
2074.descrlong: Explores the complex histories of the diverse peoples of the United States from the U.S.-Mexican War to the present. Examines the past through the eyes of people often excluded from national narratives. Includes autobiographies, music, films and on-line field research. Requires successful completion of coursework that satisfies the ENGCOM A ULR. (Offered every other year.)
